ai-ja77:1.1_0: “There is a charming tree, a cow, a cow,
ai-ja77:1.2_0: What is like a jar, a jar, and a pot.
ai-ja77:1.4_0: (also) cut up the roots, stones, and creepers?”
ai-ja77:2.1_0: dropping the corpses in a hole,
ai-ja77:2.3_0: there will be sixteen dangers for you.
ai-ja77:2.4_0: Through consummate one he does not say: ‘This is dead,’
